name: Tuscan-Style Sausage Sandwiches
author: RAGÚ®
summary: A rich pasta sauce with Italian sausage, sliced onions, spinach, and mushrooms is spooned onto split chunks of crusty bread for a hearty lunch or dinner.
ingredients: 1 pound hot Italian sausage links or sweet Italian sausage links, sliced
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1  (16-inch) loaf Italian bread or French bread, cut into 4 pieces
directions: In large nonstick skillet, brown sausage over medium-high heat
Stir in onion, spinach and mushrooms
Cook, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until sausage is done
For each sandwich, split open each bread piece, and evenly spoon in sausage mixture
Sprinkle, if desired, with crushed red pepper flakes
